entry.source: {F812}Asura\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350401}Do you know what it means to turn{F801}your blade on me? Human, learn your{F801}place.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350402}I laugh at you for fighting me.{F801}I shall send you to the land of{F801}the dead.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Asura\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350401}Do you know what it means to turn{F801}your blade on me? Human, learn your{F801}place.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,350402}I laugh at you for fighting me.{F801}I shall send you to the land of{F801}the dead.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Asura\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350403}Urgh...! To think... I would be{F801}defeated... by a hu...man...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Asura\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,350403}Urgh...! To think... I would be{F801}defeated... by a hu...man...{F801}
